texts.name: Bianor
texts.biography: Anubians are known for their magical nature, but Bianor have always been fascinated with engineering. He brought a few ballistas to his palace basement, where he got them upgraded. During battles his war mashines could kill up to 20 people with a single shot.

specialty.description:
{Ballista}

Increases the Attack and Defense skill of any Ballista for each level attained after 4th level.
specialty.name: Ballista
